Feb. 16, 2013 D Welsh Open Brass Band Entertainment Championship
Welsh Open Brass Band Entertainment Championship 0 Entertainments Contest
welsh-open-brass-band-entertainment-championship
Grand Pavilion, Porthcawl, Bridgend, Wales, UK Best Soloist: Gareth Hann, Tongwynlais Best Cornet: Gareth Hann, Tongwynlais Most Entertaining Stage Presentation: BTM Highest First Section Band not in prizes: Markham & District Youngest Player: Katie Hill, 12 (Tylorstown) Graham Rees Memorial Award: Omri Tau, Percussion (BTM)
